articles.author: PTI
articles.title: LIC exploring possibility of setting up fintech arm: Chairman Siddhartha Mohanty - The Week
articles.description: Siddhartha Mohanty said the LIC fintech arm will be developed as business model
articles.content:
As part of its digital transformation exercise, insurance behemoth Life Insurance Corporation (LIC) is exploring the possibility of setting up a fintech unit.
LIC has initiated a total digital trans… [+2147 chars]
